means: 千变万化的风景，幻灯的一种

sentence.Network_en: Phantasmagoria portray the unspeakable, they rise above the written language.
sentence.Network_cn: 幻影描绘无法形容的事物, 它超越了语言文字.

sentence.Network_en: The phantasmagoria of his brain vanished at sight of her.
sentence.Network_cn: 一见到她他脑海里的种种幻影便全没有了.

sentence.Network_en: Why, to put such a phantasmagoria on the table would be defiling the whole flat.
sentence.Network_cn: 是啊, 在桌上摆这么一个妖形怪状的东西,就把整个住宅都弄得乌烟瘴气了! ”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 志方晶子_百度百科 ... Ec Tisia 皆恕 phantasmagoria n.千变万化的风景 metafalica 指理想乡.
在一遍光影絪縕的巴黎都市幻景 (phantasmagoria)中，过去与现在彷佛相遇了，神秘，魔幻，令人啧啧称奇。跟当时名信片、城市导 …
求关于猫的眼睛的英文单词！_百度知道 ... weird = 古怪 phantasmagoria = 幻觉效应 freaky = 怪异.
阿甘本：关于《景观社会评论》的旁注 ... 战略家( Strategist) 变幻不定的光景( Phantasmagoria) 瓦尔普吉斯之夜( Walpurgis Night).

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (originally the name of a London exhibition (1802) of optical illusions produced chiefly by magic lantern): probably from French fantasmagorie, from fantasme 'phantasm' + a fanciful suffix

means.word_mean: 1. a constantly changing medley or real or imagined images (as in a dream)

auth_sentence.content: The mescal-inspired phantasmagoria, or heebie-jeebies, to which Geoffrey has succumbed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The mescal-inspired phantasmagoria, or heebie-jeebies, to which Geoffrey has succumbed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The mescal-inspired phantasmagoria, or heebie-jeebies, to which Geoffrey has succumbed.

auth_sentence.content: But stunning visuals alone can't sustain a feature film, as Ms. Taymor's phantasmagoria showed.
auth_sentence.res_content: But stunning visuals alone can't sustain a feature film, as Ms. Taymor's phantasmagoria showed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But stunning visuals alone can't sustain a feature film, as Ms. Taymor's phantasmagoria showed.
